name: MAZES (trykon)
description:
One Game a Week 2019 -- Game #2. MAZES is a platformer exploration game which allows the player to explore complex mazes in search of keys to help find the way out. 

Check out my development blog at www.trykonstudios.com/blog to read more about my game development process!

--------------------

CONTROLS:

-Arrow keys to move

-Z to jump

--------------------
